name: SplitIt
description:
It is a story of son and dad love, where son Max likes to play 'caught and scape' with his dad, once while playing Max fell from top, when son opened his eyes and become conscious he searched his dad but he was not there. Help max to climb and get back to his dad.

-Lef & Right key for movement 

-SPACE key for jump

-V key to split character

After spliting, you can use waste part as a platform.

Tileset made by: https://atomicrealm.itch.io/ "Retry" Icon made by Frey Wazza from http://www.flaticon.com/
